user.noUserMention: Please mention an user or provide it's ID

messages.cantDm: Seems like I can't DM you...
messages.invalidChannel: I didn't find this channel on the server

music.noVoiceChannel: You must be in a voice channel to execute this command
music.noMusic: You must provide the music which I'm gonna play.
music.maxDuration: The time cannot be higher than actual music length
music.nan: Your argument must be a number!

counter.firstTimeID: You must provide the channel ID when activating it for the first time!
counter.invalidChannel: I didn't find this channel in the server
counter.firstTimeDeactivating: You must activate the counter for the first time before deactivate it
counter.firstTimeChangingChannel: You must activate the counter for the first time before change the channel!

join.noChannel: You must specify the channel ID where the messages will be sent
join.successfullyActivated: <a:selena:529838831147417620> Welcome messages activated in {{channel}}, with the message `{{message}}`
join.needFirstAct: You must activate the module for the first time before change something

leave.noChannel: You must specify the channel ID where the messages wil be sent
leave.successfullyActivated: <a:selena:529838831147417620> Leave messages activated in {{channel}}, with the message `{{message}}`
leave.needFirstAct: You must activate the module for the first time before change something

lyrics.notFound: I didn't found this song lyrics...
lyrics.noArgs: You must provide the name of the music

kick.message: User {{user}} `({{tag}} - {{id}})` kicked by {{kickedBy}}, with the reason `{{reason}}`.
kick.cantKick: I cant't kick this user, perhaps my roles are below them...

ban.message: User {{user}} `({{tag}} - {{id}})` banned by {{kickedBy}}, with the reason `{{reason}}`.
ban.cantBan: I can't ban this user, perhaps my roles are below them...

unban.message: User `{{user}}` unbanned from the server by {{author}}
unban.error: Something went wrong while unbanning this user. Maybe this ban doesn't exist!

inviteMessage: Wanna invite me to you server? Awesome! Just click [here]({{link}}) to open the link in an external browser.
